entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the afternoon with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
